question: If a didentate ligand ethane -1,2-diamine is progressively added in the molar ratio en: Ni::1:1, 2:1, 3:1 to <katex>$[Ni(H_{2}O)_{6}]^{2+}$</katex> aq solution, following co-ordination entities are formed.
I. <katex>$[Ni(H_{2}O)_{4}en]^{2+}$</katex> -pale blue
II. <katex>$[Ni(H_{2}O)_{2}(en)_{2}]^{2+}-blue/purple$</katex>
III. <katex>$[Ni(en)_{3}]^{2+}$</katex> -violet
The wavelength in nm of light absorbed in case of I and III are rsepctively
